channel.title: travel work on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in travel work on Neil Grogan

item.title: FON, New Job and Commuting!
item.description: I regularly read other Irish blogs to see whats happening and whats the latest tech thing amongst others. It seems that may have come to fruition, with FON, a community wifi project, sending me out a free router!! I am exicted about this, as I hope to convince all my neighbours eventually to get it, and maybe who knows, I may even achieve the biggest fon hotspot, if I take my campaign estate wide, to neighbours all around!
